resources.string: Your system is up to date
Your device does not support OTA updates!
An error has occurred during download!\nPlease, try again later.
New update installed successfully.\nPlease, reboot now.
New update failed to be downloaded.\nCheck your logs for more information.
New update failed to be installed.\nCheck your logs for more information.
The update is still ongoing. Leaving the app now will stop it.\nDo you really want to exit now?
Magisk was detected! If you proceed with the update you may lose Magisk or the installation may fail!
Take in consideration that you may lose your userdata if you proceed!\nTo prevent this, cancel this dialog, reboot and flash the latest update on fastboot mode.\nDo you want to proceed anyway?
